modName: DB Shrouded Hood and Robes as Light Armor
summary: Sets the Dark Brotherhood Shrouded Hood and Robes to Light armor. Equal to Leather armor and Upgrade able at a workbench.
descriptionHtml:
Info:

Sets the Dark Brotherhood Shrouded Hood and Robes to Light Armor. Equal to Leather armor and Upgrade able at a workbench. Just for those who like Light Armor and want those perks to count while looking cool.

Made by special request for gek0ftw.

Installation:

Extract the ESP into your Data file. Enable it via the Launcher.


Distribution:

Feel free to do distribute this, just notify me and acknowledge my work.


Send me a PM if you have a request for any other armor swaps.
author: Malchus
